body:
okay then in this sad situation, the proper fix is:

- in FindBLAS.cmake check if cblas API is available via a small test program. [Something similar to this](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/cmake/FindBLAS.cmake#L245-L257) that sets BLAS_USE_CBLAS_DOT
- [Here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/THGeneral.h.in#L16) add `#cmakedefine BLAS_USE_CBLAS_DOT`
- Then in your current PR, replace `BLAS_IS_ACCELERATE` with `BLAS_USE_CBLAS_DOT`
